name: Trial Of The Frog
description:
After the life of the frog has ended, their souls are put into The Prism for almost eternal judgement. They must complete their final trial to achieve their Frog Ascension and gain entry to Frog Heaven.

This game is a precision based 3-D platformer, partially inspired by the game design of Getting Over It, where one wrong move or miscalculation could send you back to the start.

This game was made for the Frog Jam by JappyGuy, and is the first game jam I've done! I hope you enjoy!
